code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Login=_ref=>{let{setUser}=_ref;const[username,setUsername]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const handleLogin=()=>{if(username&&password.length===4){setUser({username,password});}else{alert('有効なユーザー名と4桁のパスワードを入力してください。');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{textAlign:'center',marginTop:'50px'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"\u30ED\u30B0\u30A4\u30F3"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"\u30E6\u30FC\u30B6\u30FC\u540D",value:username,onChange:e=>setUsername(e.target.value),style:{display:'block',margin:'10px auto',padding:'10px'}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",placeholder:"4\u6841\u306E\u30D1\u30B9\u30EF\u30FC\u30C9",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),maxLength:"4",style:{display:'block',margin:'10px auto',padding:'10px'}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleLogin,style:{padding:'10px 20px'},children:"\u30ED\u30B0\u30A4\u30F3"})]});};export default Login;
